snippet: The Iranian military was so worried about the threat of an Israeli airstrike in 2007 and 2008 that it mistakenly fired on civilian airliners and, in one instance, on one of its own military aircraft.
abstract: Classified American intelligence reports show that the Iranian military was so apprehensive about the threat of Israeli airstrikes on its nuclear installations in 2007 and 2008 that it mistakenly fired on civilian airliners and, in one instance, on one of its own military aircraft.
lead_paragraph: The Iranian military was so worried about the threat of an Israeli airstrike in 2007 and 2008 that it mistakenly fired on civilian airliners and, in one instance, on one of its own military aircraft.

headline.seo: Wary of Israel, Iran Is Said to Blunder in Strikes
headline.main: Wary of Israel, Iran Is Said to Err in Strikes
headline.print_headline: Iran, Wary Of Israel, Is Said to Err In Strikes
